content: this legal text summarizes a court case that took place in ragusa on december 28 2010 the case involved parties whose names are not mentioned the court awarded costs to both the plaintiffs and the defendants with the plaintiffs incurring €6708 and the defendants incurring €5900 the court also made a final decision regarding the division of a building owned by the plaintiff gr and the defendants gg and gagi the court ordered that the property be divided with gr receiving 324 gc receiving 724 and the defendants sharing the remaining portion equally the defendants were also required to pay €14333333 to the plaintiffs spouses within one month the costs of the proceedings will be divided proportionally among the parties the courts decision was made on december 15 2010 and filed with the registry on december 28 2010
